arts.ttl: Portsmouth boss pinpoints 'shining light' among wreckage of crushing Cardiff set-back
arts.sum: John Mousinho has pinpointed the only ‘shining light’ of a dismal Cardiff evening.

arts.ttl: Furious Portsmouth boss reveals what was said in Cardiff City dressing-room inquest as side slump to bottom of Championship
arts.sum: John Mousinho ripped into his Pompey players as they were read the riot act for their weak Cardiff shortcomings.

arts.ttl: Portsmouth boss John Mousinho reeling from triple injury set-back amid demoralising Cardiff defeat
arts.sum: Pompey are sweating on fresh injury concerns after losing a trio of players in the first half of their Cardiff loss.

Following a corner-kick by Alex Robertson, he found Goutas in the box again, who directed his header towards the back post and pounced on by Callum Robinson, who fired home off the underside of the crossbar. Following a corner which wasn’t cleared far, Robertson picked it up, weaved through the Portsmouth defence and played it through to Anwar El Ghazi into Robinson, who headed over.

arts.ttl: Cardiff 2 Portsmouth 0: Neil Allen's verdict - Old wounds reopened as Blues return to awful habits
arts.sum: It took five minutes to bring the soaring Blues crashing back to earth following their precious QPR pick-me-up.

arts.ttl: ‘Horror display’, ‘tormented’, ‘totally anonymous’: Jordan Cross’ Portsmouth ratings from worrying Cardiff City reverse
arts.sum: The ratings are in from Pompey’s clash with Cardiff City tonight.

arts.ttl: Cardiff City 2-0 Portsmouth: Bluebirds out of relegation zone as they go four games unbeaten
arts.sum: The Bluebirds welcomed Pompey to CCS and beat them 2-0

arts.ttl: Cardiff City player ratings against Portsmouth as defender stands out and forward has his best outing
arts.sum: The Bluebirds came out on top against Portsmouth and this is how they rated

arts.ttl: Cardiff revival continues with win over Portsmouth
arts.sum: The Bluebirds have taken 10 points from four games.

arts.ttl: Portsmouth suffer double injury blow in disastrous first half at Cardiff
arts.sum: Two injuries have compounded a disastrous first half for Pompey at Cardiff tonight.
